verses.text: 哥轄子孫的職責耶和華對摩西和亞倫說：

words.note: Chinese transliteration of 'Yahweh' or 'Jehovah'

verses.text: 「你要從利未人中，登記哥轄子孫的總數，照著他們的家族、父家，

words.note: Refers to the descendants of Levi, serving in religious capacities.
Refers to the male lineage or ancestral family group.

verses.text: 從三十歲以上，直到五十歲，能進來供職，在會幕裡工作的，你都要登記。

words.note: Common in formal or religious contexts.
Lit. 'assembly tent/curtain', referring to the portable sanctuary.

verses.text: 哥轄子孫在會幕裡的工作就是管理至聖之物。

words.note: Lit. 'assembly tent/curtain', referring to the portable sanctuary.
Refers to the sacred items within the tabernacle's Most Holy Place.

verses.text: 起營出發的時候，亞倫和他的兒子要進去，把遮蓋至聖所的幔子卸下來，用來遮蓋約櫃；

words.note: Specific to military or nomadic settings, common in biblical narratives.
Connects verb phrase to noun, indicating 'when' or 'at the time of'.
Used to prepose the object of a verb, indicating disposal or manipulation.
The innermost chamber of the tabernacle or temple.
Refers to the veil separating the Holy Place from the Most Holy Place.

words.definition: to be used for, in order to

words.note: The sacred chest containing the tablets of the Law.

verses.text: 又把海狗皮罩蓋在上面，再鋪上純藍色的布，然後把槓穿上。

words.note: Refers to a specific type of leather used in the Tabernacle.

verses.text: 在陳設餅的桌子上，他們要鋪上藍色布，把盤子、碟子、杯和奠酒的爵擺在上面，桌子上也必須有常獻餅；

words.note: The twelve loaves placed on the table in the Tabernacle.
A ritual offering of wine or other liquid.
An ancient bronze vessel for wine, used in rituals.
Refers to the showbread that was perpetually present on the table.

verses.text: 在這些物件上面，他們要鋪上朱紅色布，再蓋上海狗皮罩，然後把槓穿上。

words.note: A deep red color, often used for sacred textiles.
A protective outer covering for sacred objects during transport.

verses.text: 他們要拿藍色布，把燈臺和燈臺上的燈盞、剪子、蠟花盤，以及為燈臺所用一切盛油的器具遮蓋起來。

words.note: Specifically refers to the golden lampstand in the Tabernacle/Temple.
The actual receptacles for oil and wicks on the lampstand.
Tools for trimming lamp wicks.
Dishes for collecting wick trimmings and ash from the lamps.

verses.text: 他們又要把燈臺和燈臺的一切器具，都包在海狗皮裡，然後放在抬架上。

words.note: A frame or poles used for carrying heavy or sacred objects.

verses.text: 在金壇上面，他們要鋪上藍色布，再蓋上海狗皮罩，然後把槓穿上。

words.note: Refers to a specific durable leather, often translated as badger, dugong, or porpoise skin.

verses.text: 他們又要把聖所裡供職使用的一切器具，都包在藍色布裡，再蓋上海狗皮罩，然後放在抬架上。

words.note: To perform duties, especially sacred ones.
Refers to a specific durable leather, often translated as badger, dugong, or porpoise skin.

verses.text: 他們要清除壇上的灰，把紫色布鋪在壇上。
又要把在壇上供職使用的一切器具，就是火鼎、肉叉、鏟子、盤子，都擺在上面；再蓋上海狗皮罩，然後穿上槓。

words.note: To perform duties, especially sacred ones.
Refers to vessels used for carrying fire or embers.
Refers to a specific durable leather, often translated as badger, dugong, or porpoise skin.

verses.text: 全營出發的時候，亞倫和他的兒子，把聖所和聖所的一切器具遮蓋完了以後，哥轄的子孫就要來抬；只是他們不可觸摸聖物，免得他們死亡。會幕裡這些物件是哥轄的子孫應當抬的。

words.note: Often used to refer to a clan or tribal lineage in biblical texts.
Often used to refer to a clan or tribal lineage in biblical texts.

verses.text: 亞倫祭司的兒子以利亞撒的職務是看管點燈的油、芬芳的香、常獻的素祭和膏油，也要看管整個帳幕和其中所有的一切，以及聖所和聖所的器具。」

words.note: Refers to sacred vessels or instruments.

verses.text: 耶和華對摩西和亞倫說：
「你們不可把哥轄家族的派系從利未人中剪除；

words.note: Often used in the sense of 'cutting off' a lineage or group.

verses.text: 他們接近至聖之物的時候，亞倫和他的兒子要進去，指定他們各人當辦的和當抬的工作；你們要這樣待他們，好讓他們活著，不至死亡；

words.note: Connects descriptive phrase to '時候'.

words.definition: not to cause, not resulting in

verses.text: 只是他們連片刻也不可進去觀看聖物，免得他們死亡。」
革順子孫的職責耶和華對摩西說：

words.note: Gershon was a son of Levi.

verses.text: 「你也要登記革順子孫的總數，照著他們的父家、家族，

words.note: Refers to a patriarchal family unit, common in biblical context.
Refers to a larger tribal subdivision.

verses.text: 從三十歲以上，直到五十歲，能進來供職，在會幕裡工作的，你都要數點。

words.note: A formal term for rendering service, especially in a religious or official capacity.
The portable sanctuary used by the Israelites.
Often used in biblical contexts for taking a census or inventory.

verses.text: 革順人的家庭所作的事和所抬的物如下：
他們要抬帳幕的幔子、會幕和會幕的蓋，以及蓋在上面的海狗皮罩和會幕的門簾、

words.note: Synonym for 會幕, often refers to the outer structure.
Specific liturgical curtain, e.g., the veil in the Tabernacle/Temple.
Refers to a specific material used in the Tabernacle.
Specifically refers to the curtain at the entrance of the Tabernacle.

verses.text: 院子的帷子、院子的門簾、繩子，以及一切使用的器具；有關這些器具所當作的，他們都要辦理。

words.note: Refers to a hanging screen or curtain, often for tents or beds.
Forms a nominal phrase with the following verb, emphasizing the object of action.

words.definition: ought to do, should be done

verses.text: 革順的子孫所有的任務，他們在一切當抬的和當辦的事上，都要照著亞倫和他兒子的吩咐；他們當抬的，你們都要把職務分派給他們。

words.note: Indicates scope or aspect.
Introduces the object of a verb, indicating it is disposed of.

verses.text: 這是革順子孫的家族在會幕裡所辦的事；他們的職務要受亞倫祭司的兒子以他瑪的管理。

words.note: Forms a nominal phrase with the following verb.
Indicates passive voice: 'to undergo', 'to be subjected to'.

verses.text: 米拉利子孫的職責「米拉利的子孫，你也要照著他們的宗族，按著他們的家室數點他們；
從三十歲以上，直到五十歲，能進來供職，在會幕裡工作的，你都要數點。
他們在會幕裡的一切事奉，他們的職務，就是抬帳幕的木板、橫閂、柱子和插座、

words.note: Lit. 'assembly tent', referring to the portable sanctuary.
Often used in a religious context for serving God or in ministry.
Refers to the dwelling tent; similar to '會幕' in biblical context.
Refers to the bases or pedestals for the pillars in the tabernacle.

verses.text: 院子四周的柱子、插座、橛子、繩子、一切用具和使用的東西；他們當抬的器具，你們要按著名字一一指定。

words.note: Refers to the bases or pedestals for the pillars.
Common word with interesting etymology (lit. 'east west').

verses.text: 這是米拉利子孫的家族在會幕裡所辦的一切事務，都受亞倫祭司的兒子以他瑪的管理。」

words.note: Forms a nominal phrase from a verb, often indicating 'that which is done'.

words.definition: to receive, to undergo, to be subject to

verses.text: 數點利未各宗族的人口摩西、亞倫和會眾的領袖們，把哥轄的子孫，按著他們的宗族和父家，

words.note: Indicates that the following noun is the direct object of the verb.

verses.text: 從三十歲以上，直到五十歲，能進來供職，在會幕裡工作的，都數點了。

words.note: Refers to serving in an official or religious capacity.
Turns the preceding phrase into a noun phrase, 'those who work'.
Indicates completion or a new situation.

verses.text: 按著宗族，他們被數點的，共有二千七百五十人。

words.note: Refers to a lineage or tribal group.
Specifically refers to a census or tally.

words.pinyin: èr qiān qī bǎi wǔ shí

verses.text: 這是哥轄家族被數點的人數，是所有在會幕裡辦事的人數，就是摩西和亞倫，照著耶和華藉摩西吩咐數點的。

words.note: Refers to the Kohathite family/clan.
Refers to the portable sanctuary used by the Israelites.
The Hebrew name of God.
Formal usage, often found in religious texts.
Often used for commands from a superior.

verses.text: 革順的子孫，按著他們的宗族和父家被數點的，

words.note: Refers to the male lineage or family unit.

verses.text: 從三十歲以上，直到五十歲，能進去供職，在會幕裡工作的，

words.note: Formal term for taking up an official or sacred duty.

verses.text: 按著他們的宗族和父家，被數點的人數，共有二千六百三十人。

words.pinyin: èr qiān liù bǎi sān shí

verses.text: 這些是革順子孫的家族被數點的人數，是一切在會幕裡辦事的，就是摩西和亞倫照著耶和華的吩咐數點的。

words.note: Refers to taking a census.
Forms an adjectival phrase modifying '人數'.
The portable sanctuary used by Israelites.
Contextually refers to service in the tabernacle.
Forms a nominal phrase meaning 'those who...'.
Often refers to God's divine command.
Refers to taking a census.

verses.text: 米拉利的子孫，按著宗族和父家，

words.note: Refers to tribal divisions.
Refers to patriarchal family units.

verses.text: 從三十歲以上，直到五十歲，能進去供職，在會幕裡工作的，都數點了。

words.note: Refers to performing sacred duties or service.
The portable sanctuary used by Israelites.
Contextually refers to service in the tabernacle.
Forms a nominal phrase meaning 'those who...'.
Refers to taking a census.

verses.text: 按著宗族，他們被數點的，共有三千二百人。

words.note: Refers to tribal divisions.
Refers to taking a census.
Forms a nominal phrase meaning 'those who were counted'.

verses.text: 這些是米拉利子孫的家族被數點的人數，就是摩西和亞倫，照著耶和華的吩咐數點的。

words.note: Refers to taking a census.
Forms an adjectival phrase modifying '人數'.
Often refers to God's divine command.
Refers to taking a census.

verses.text: 被數點的利未人，就是摩西和亞倫，以及以色列的眾領袖，按著宗族和家室數點的，
從三十歲以上，直到五十歲，可以進去供職，在會幕裡作抬物件的工作的，

words.note: Commonly used for official or religious service.
Refers to the portable sanctuary used by Israelites.

verses.text: 他們的人數，共有八千五百八十人。
照著耶和華藉摩西吩咐的，把他們數點，各人按著自己所辦的事和所抬的物件被數點，正如耶和華吩咐摩西的。

words.note: Indicates the object of the following verb or forms a nominal phrase.
Indicates the object of the following verb or forms a nominal phrase.
